info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 08 at 5:36PM MST until August 08 at 6:15PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Yuma County in southwestern Arizona... * Until 615 PM MST. * At 534 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles south of Tacna, or 24 miles east of Fortuna Foothills, moving west at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Motorists will encounter very hazardous driving conditions. * Locations impacted include... Wellton and Tacna. This includes AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 29 and 44. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For those outside, move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain are also occurring with this storm. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
